headline: Paycom promotes Shane Hadlock to lead IT; appoints Rachael Gannon to chief automation officer
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, August 18, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, today announced the expanded role of Shane Hadlock as Paycom’s chief client officer and chief technology officer and the promotion of Rachael Gannon to chief automation officer, effective Aug. 18. Brad Smith has been named the company’s senior technical strategist and will continue reporting to CEO Chad Richison.

headline: Paycom (PAYC) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of HR software provider Paycom (NYSE:PAYC) jumped 3.3% in the afternoon session after the stock gained on M&A speculation within the human resources software sector, following a report that private equity firm Thoma Bravo is in talks to acquire competitor Dayforce.

headline: Dayforce Stock Jumps On Report Of Private Equity Suitor
summary: Dayforce stock jumped early Monday amid a report private equity firm Thoma Bravo is in talks to acquire the software company.
